naivebayes
Class Classifier

java.lang.Object
  naivebayes.Classifier

public class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object

A two class naive Bayes classifier using normal densities

Constructor Summary
Classifier(double[][] featureClass1, double[][] featureClass2, double pC1, double pC2)
          This constructor method fits the parameters of two normal densities and stores the priors for each class
 
Method Summary
 double classify(double[] featureVector)
          This method should be modified in order to returns the probability of being in class 1 using all features
 double classify(double[] featureVector, int featureNo)
          This method returns the probability of being in class 1 using only data from one feature which is in featureVector[featureNo]
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                       int featureNo)

classify

public double classify(double[] featureVector)
This method should be modified in order to returns the probability of being in class 1 using all features
